abstract: Urban Athlete column notes that thousands of cyclists who ride on paths along the Hudson River and over the George Washington Bridge to and from New Jersey pass through Hudson Heights, a small neighborhood in upper Manhattan.
snippet: A corner of Manhattan called Hudson Heights is a route for thousands of cyclists who ride on paths along the Hudson River in Manhattan and over the George Washington Bridge to New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: A corner of Manhattan called Hudson Heights is a route for thousands of cyclists who ride on paths along the Hudson River in Manhattan and over the George Washington Bridge to New Jersey.

headline.main: Over the River and Through the ’Hoods
headline.print_headline: Over the River and Through the ’Hoods
headline.seo: Cycling Over George Washington Bridge to New Jersey
